resources.string: Hello CodePath, this is my pre-work app for the Intermediate Android Development Course. Click on the button below to say hi, and find more about the app on the menu bar at the top!
Hello! My name is Fernando Sckaff. I am an international student from Brazil. \nFun Fact - My favorite food is sushi.
This past summer I had the privilege to enter the Station1 Frontiers Fellowship, and do an internship with BEAM Diagnostics, Inc.
Also, since the beginning of 2022, I have been doing cancer research in the Lamba Laboratory at the Pharmacy College at UF.
Logo of the University of Florida
